content.text: Hello, I'm doing well! Thanks for asking!  How about you?
I'm good! I'm a musician and I've recently become truthful with my coach. How about you? What do you do for a living?
I'm not sure of my current weight, but I'm working on it. I'm looking forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. What was your coach's reaction?
He was a little disappointed, but he's been very supportive. I'm glad to hear that you're looking forward to starting a new life in Australia. What are you most excited about?
I'm most excited about meeting new people and sharing my opinions with them. I haven't been in a fight, but I've been in situations where I felt threatened because of my sexuality.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope that you don't have to experience that again.
Thanks. I'm also a collector of dragon figurines. They remind me of my childhood. What kind of music do you play?
I play the violin. I love playing classical music. What's your favorite type of music?
I like all types of music, but my favorite is probably pop.
